name: Loose Ends (halconillustrates)
description:
"At some point, you'll have to look back at the things you've left behind."

A little while has passed, and it's time to go back to the beginning of where all was meant to end. Walk with Aiden in his dormitory and unravel the stories hidden by moments forgotten.

Find your missing belongings and you might hear familiar voices. Discover the mystery of Loose Ends, and begin to recognize the past that has shaped the present.


Controls

Move using the WASD keys
L Shift - Hold to sprint
Hold right click - Zoom view
E - Interact with an object
Q - Inspect an object
Tab - Use camera (once obtained)

"What I know..."

Forced to leave his dormitory, Aiden Clay has decided to return and collect the things he has left. While some of them have become worn and meaningless, others have found a new sense for him. 

Videogames, posters, and pictures are some that Aiden hold dear, but there are others that he may deem more valuable than before.

Aiden made sure to think ahead before going back, can you finish his preparations?

  • To pack things up
    Follow Aiden in finding items scattered across the dormitory.
  • To keep an eye out
    Certain items you see may be useless now, but a different chapter calls for a different setting...
  • To look and remember
    Some items may give Aiden a clear memory of what once was.
  • To sit back and enjoy the view
    The red autumn leaves, after all, are truly a beautiful sight.
"Faces I remember..."

 Aiden Clay

A calm, not-so-sociable, yet warm and reliable person, Aiden takes care of the dormitory for his roommates. A huge fan of video games, Aiden has spent more time on them than attending in the university. Those around him are curious as to how he passes with high scores.

After leaving the dormitory, Aiden has decided to return, and it would have been a while since the two have last seen him. 

Luke Prime

Timid and shy, a pretty quiet guy. Luke would rather keep his thoughts to himself.  

He used to spend his time in the dormitory, so he has a closer link with Aiden. He’s not much of an admirer to the outside scenery. but for this autumn he's decided to take some strolls. He says it helps give him creativity, although he's no fan of arts. 

He’s a huge geek, but for some reason has shown a distaste towards some video games and movies. 

Gabi Agarin

A confident young lady, focused on creating a brighter future for herself. Gabi can do anything to achieve her goals.

Like an older sister to Aiden and Luke, she makes sure the two are taken care of. However, this kindness does not extend to anyone else. She is the only daughter and heir of her illustrious family. 

Formerly a member of several clubs and organizations, Gabi has decided to spend more of her time in the dormitory, along with her friends.

"I'm back home..."

An expensive dormitory home to Aiden, Luke, and Gabi. It's pretty wide, so there's lots of room for everything. Lots of dormitories are like this one, but they're all quite far from each other, so it's mostly the three spending time together.  Events from before have changed this happy home along with the people in it, and Aiden will be here to find out.

Credits

  • Filebase - Most of the furnishing in the dorm was from filebase, some of them retextured by Karu.
  • WOW Sound - The background music and the Piano theme was taken from their royalty-free sound starter pack.
